analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xf9dfbdc37bf41fd78e9c8ef195f5f21a9a175401.sol:
	Contract istanbul has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xf9dfbdc37bf41fd78e9c8ef195f5f21a9a175401.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xf9dfbdc37bf41fd78e9c8ef195f5f21a9a175401.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
